query: What does the No Electronic Theft (NET) Act define as "financial gain" in terms of Federal copyright law?
doc1: No Electronic Theft (NET) Act - Amends Federal copyright law to define "financial gain" to include the receipt of anything of value, including the receipt of other copyrighted works.
